title: U.S. crude oil jumps more than 8%, topping $72 a barrel on fears of Iran supply disruption
summary_full: It is unclear who will ultimately govern Iran, the fourth-largest oil producer in OPEC, after U.S.-Israel strikes killed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.
summary_public: It is unclear who will ultimately govern Iran, the fourth-largest oil producer in OPEC, after U.S.-Israel strikes killed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: U.S.-Israel strikes killed Ayatollah Ali Khamenei.
